DESCRIPTION: If this card is Exhausted or Purged, activate the following effect.
Draw X cards. If you draw a Kosmo card, gain 1 Energy, this only happens the first time per card. Non-Kosmo cards are Purged upon draw.
Played cards this way keep the orginal features, so don't play cards that can't be normally played.
Block is not removed at the start of your next turn.
When played shuffle this card into your draw pile.
